articles.title: Sushil Kumar entered crime world through toll business, had formed partnership with Greater Noida gangster - India Today
articles.description: Police of Delhi-NCR region were aware of Sushil Kumar's relations with gangsters and criminals but had no solid evidence against him. Sushil had entered the world of crime through toll business.
articles.content: Two-time Olympic medallist Sushil Kumar's relation with infamous gangsters is something which was known to the Delhi Police and UP Special Task Force (STF) for a long time now. An officer has in fact… [+1608 chars]
